text: Chelostoma is a genus of bees in the Osmiini tribe of the family Megachilidae. The genus is divided into 5 subgenera with at least 60 described species. Chelostoma campanularum Chelostoma philadelphi, male Chelostoma rapunculi ==Species== These 60 species belong to the genus Chelostoma: * Chelostoma aegaeicum Muller, 2012 g * Chelostoma aureocinctum
